meanings.definition: A long, narrow mark or band.
meanings.sent1: I drew a straight line on the paper.
meanings.sent2: The line for the bus was very long.
meanings.sent3: The line of ants marching across the floor was like a tiny parade.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a line of sunshine breaking through the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The line etched into the rock was a permanent reminder of the ancient civilization.

meanings.definition: A row of people or things.
meanings.sent1: The students stood in a line to board the school bus.
meanings.sent2: The line of trees along the path provided shade from the sun.
meanings.sent3: The line of ducks waddling behind their mother was a comical sight.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the sky formed a perfect line across the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The line of books on the shelf stretched from one end to the other.

meanings.definition: A direction or course of movement.
meanings.sent1: Follow the line on the map to reach the treasure.
meanings.sent2: The line of cars moved slowly through the traffic jam.
meanings.sent3: The line of dancers swirled gracefully across the dance floor.
meanings.sent4: The line of birds in the sky pointed towards the setting sun.
meanings.sent5: The line of ants marched steadily towards their anthill.

meanings.definition: A connected series of people or things.
meanings.sent1: The line of dominoes fell one after the other.
meanings.sent2: The line of events led to a surprising conclusion.
meanings.sent3: The line of cars stretched for miles on the highway.
meanings.sent4: The line of notes in the melody created a beautiful harmony.
meanings.sent5: The line of footprints in the sand showed the path taken by the hikers.

meanings.sent1: The fence marked the line between our yard and the neighbor's.
meanings.sent2: The finish line of the race was just ahead.
meanings.sent3: The line between right and wrong can sometimes be blurry.
meanings.sent4: The line of the horizon seemed to merge sky and sea into one.
meanings.sent5: The line where the colors meet creates a beautiful gradient in the painting.
